blog.name: thegriffin-blakefamily
blog.title: And Now You're Home
blog.description: Erin. I would defend Clarke Griffin with my life. Probably 59% The 100, 40% Critical Role, and 1% random nonsense. Not spoiler-free. Bellarke and Fjorester trash. I play video games, read a lot of books, and write. (Other fandoms may include, but are not limited to: Star Wars, GOT, Anne with an E, Crazy Ex-Girlfriend, Stranger Things, Veronica Mars, B99, Superstore)

summary: I’m reading through a bunch of my old CR posts and the funniest thing is how fast I went from “I don’t know if I ship Fjorester...
body: I’m reading through a bunch of my old CR posts and the funniest thing is how fast I went from “I don’t know if I ship Fjorester because they’re cute or because Travis and Laura are just cute” to “HEY FJORESTER IS EVERYTHING TO ME I’LL DIE WITHOUT IT”.

reblog.comment: I’m reading through a bunch of my old CR posts and the funniest thing is how fast I went from “I don’t know if I ship Fjorester because they’re cute or because Travis and Laura are just cute” to “HEY FJORESTER IS EVERYTHING TO ME I’LL DIE WITHOUT IT”.

trail.content_raw: I’m reading through a bunch of my old CR posts and the funniest thing is how fast I went from “I don’t know if I ship Fjorester because they’re cute or because Travis and Laura are just cute” to “HEY FJORESTER IS EVERYTHING TO ME I’LL DIE WITHOUT IT”.
trail.content: I’m reading through a bunch of my old CR posts and the funniest thing is how fast I went from “I don’t know if I ship Fjorester because they’re cute or because Travis and Laura are just cute” to “HEY FJORESTER IS EVERYTHING TO ME I’LL DIE WITHOUT IT”.

blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: purple yellow red and blue by portugal. the man for mollymauk?
question: purple yellow red and blue by portugal. the man for mollymauk?
answer:
Damn, yeah!

“All I wanna do is/ 
Live in ecstasy, I know what’s best for me/ 
I can’t help it, it’s this hopeless itch/ 
I just wanna feel/ 
Purple, yellow, red and blue” 

Apparently the song’s about ecstasy and that works on one level for Molly — but so does the idea of Molly just looking for new experiences and feelings with his short, colourful life.

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: Feather, Fur, & Fin by Danny Michel for Mr. Clay.   It oddly parallels Caduceus's life from just before meeting the M9 to now.
question: Feather, Fur, & Fin by Danny Michel for Mr. Clay.   It oddly parallels Caduceus's life from just before meeting the M9 to now.
answer:
Yeah I feel like a song about the environment’s destruction is very Clay! And I see what you mean about the parallels. This feels like him realizing he has to go traveling to save his home:

“I went to the country to escape the noise and lights/ 
And I laid there in the pine cones all night/ 
I woke in the morning when all the trees were gone/ 
I got this sinking feeling, everything felt wrong” 

And then this feels like the pirate voyages:

“I went to an island down the Caribbean way/ 
And I laid there in the sand all day […] 
I swam the ocean reef but the coral all was grey”

And “I went to the city when all the trees were gone” could be the travels to Xhorhas, empty of most conventional forms of life. 

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: bc i am beaujester trash: friends by ed sheeran, i will by mitski, and talk me down by troye sivan really reminds me of them!!...
question: bc i am beaujester trash: friends by ed sheeran, i will by mitski, and talk me down by troye sivan really reminds me of them!! esp with the chorus to friends, mitski’s “Stay with me/hold my hand/There's no need /To be brave”, and talk me down just screams hopelessly pining beaujester
answer:
Eyyyyy I’m Beaujester trash too :D And I love all of these!

I totally get what you mean about the chorus of Friends:

“Friends just sleep in another bed/ 
And friends don’t treat me like you do/ 
Well I know that there’s a limit to everything” 

It’s got a big roommates-to-lovers-gradually-realizing-that-they’re-not-just-friends mood, which tbh is a big appeal of Beaujester.

I Will is gorgeous for them and those lyrics you chose… Beau learning to be vulnerable around Jester… Jester learning not to hide her fear and sadness… perfect. I also like the first verse for the sheer domesticity: 

“I will wash your hair at night/ 
And dry it off with care/ 
I will see your body bare/ 
And still I will live here” 

(I Will was also sent in for Veth/Yeza!)

And hhhhhhh the pining in Talk Me Down… so good…

“So if you don’t mind, I’ll walk that line/ 
Stuck on the bridge between us/ 
Grey areas and expectations […] 
But I wanna sleep next to you/ 
And I wanna come home to you/ 
I wanna hold hands with you/ 
I wanna be close to you” 

So soft and good……. damn :D

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

But where’s the whole Caleb and Essik tension? From the posts I saw I thought this would be a lot bigger thing, but so far nothing…

Then again as I said I am a little behind, so

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: I’m a little confused about people claiming that the Fjorester kiss came out of nowhere because I thought it was pretty clear...
body: I’m a little confused about people claiming that the Fjorester kiss came out of nowhere because I thought it was pretty clear that Fjord has been showing more and more signs of starting to return Jester’s feelings! There have been lots of moments of awkward flirting and fumbling affection, the kiss surprised me but it ABSOLUTELY didn’t come out of nowhere. Fjord’s been falling in love for quite a while now, he’s just finally taken the plunge to show his feelings in a more concrete way.
